summary.para: Retrieves a specified number of elements.

param.name: celt
param.para: The number of elements to retrieve.

param.name: rgelt
param.para: When this method returns, contains the address of an array of pointers. Each IAssocHandler represents a single handler.

param.name: pceltFetched
param.para: When this method returns, contains a pointer to the number of elements retrieved.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Exposes a method that allows enumeration of a collection of handlers associated with particular file name extensions.

remarks.para: is the usual method of creating an IEnumAssocHandlers pointer.
